snippet: The health and veterinary authorities on Friday reported outbreaks of avian flu hundreds of miles apart on opposite ends of Nigeria.
abstract: Nigerian health and veterinary authorities report outbreaks of avian flu in both southern and northern ends of the country.
lead_paragraph: The health and veterinary authorities on Friday reported outbreaks of avian flu hundreds of miles apart on opposite ends of Nigeria.

headline.main: Nigeria: 2 Regions Report New Outbreaks of Bird Flu
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: 2 Regions Report New Outbreaks of Bird Flu
